events.body:
@btcdrak Could you close the other 2 pulls and ask this one to get tagged with [backport]?

Also, travis issue with https?

```
Fetching qrencode...

ERROR: no certificate subject alternative name matches

    requested host name `fukuchi.org'.

To connect to fukuchi.org insecurely, use `--no-check-certificate'.

ERROR: no certificate subject alternative name matches

    requested host name `dev.bitcoincore.org'.

To connect to dev.bitcoincore.org insecurely, use `--no-check-certificate'.

make: *** [/home/travis/build/bitcoin/bitcoin/depends/sources/download-stamps/.stamp_fetched-qrencode-qrencode-3.4.4.tar.bz2.hash] Error 5

make: Leaving directory `/home/travis/build/bitcoin/bitcoin/depends'

The command "make $MAKEJOBS -C depends HOST=$HOST $DEP_OPTS" failed and exited with 2 during .
```
Can we also get a redirect setup so this doesn't break? :/

events.message:
Update Makefile.

Note there is no strong need for ssl here because by default
packages are downloaded using http:// from places like
sourceforge anyway, and checked against cryptographic hashes.

events.body:
Can confirm the redirect is working. Thanks @btcdrak.

(we still need a change like this, but we can think about it some time longer where we want the fallback files to be hosted)
Keeping this as-is. The level of indirection afforded by the redirect is useful, even if we move the files somewhere else.
